com.samysadi.acs.hardware.misc

Interface MemoryUnit<Zone extends MemoryZone>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Entity, Notifier, Probed
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Ram, Storage, VirtualMemoryUnit<Zone,Unit>, VirtualRam, VirtualStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemoryUnitImpl, RamDefault, StorageDefault, VirtualMemoryUnitDynamic, VirtualMemoryUnitElastic, VirtualMemoryUnitFixedSize, VirtualMemoryUnitImpl, VirtualRamDynamic, VirtualRamElastic, VirtualRamFixedSize, VirtualStorageDynamic, VirtualStorageElastic, VirtualStorageFixedSize

    public interface MemoryUnit<Zone extends MemoryZone>
extends Entity
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      Allocates the given size on the memory unit.
      You should not have to call this method directly.

      Creates a clone of this entity and sets its parent to null.
      Zone findReplica(Zone zone)
      Returns the first MemoryZone candidate that satisfies candidate.isReplicaOf(zone), or null.

      Frees size on the memory unit.
      You should not have to call this method directly.

      Returns the total capacity of this memory unit in number of Simulator.BYTEs.

      Returns the total free capacity (in number of Simulator.BYTEs) on this memory unit.

      Returns a list containing all memory zones inside this MemoryUnit.

      Returns the Host that contains this memory unit.

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        MemoryUnit<Zone> clone()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Creates a clone of this entity and sets its parent to null.

        This is a deep clone method which also clones almost all children entities and sets their parents to the newly created clone. The only children which are not cloned are those implementing the UncloneableEntity interface.

        Implementations must ensure that the new clone will be independent from the current entity.

        Specified by:
        clone in interface Entity
        Specified by:
        clone in interface Notifier

      • getParentHost

        Host getParentHost()
        Returns the Host that contains this memory unit. This may be different from Entity.getParent().
        Returns:
        the Host that contains this memory unit

      • getCapacity

        long getCapacity()
        Returns the total capacity of this memory unit in number of Simulator.BYTEs.
        Returns:
        the total capacity of this memory unit in number of Simulator.BYTEs

      • setCapacity

        void setCapacity(long capacity)
        Updates the capacity (in number of Simulator.BYTEs) of this MemoryUnit.

        The capacity difference is added or subtracted to/from the free capacity of this unit.

        A NotificationCodes.MU_CAPACITY_CHANGED notification is thrown.

        Parameters:
        capacity -
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the new capacity cannot be set, if is negative or if it will result in a negative free capacity

      • getFreeCapacity

        long getFreeCapacity()
        Returns the total free capacity (in number of Simulator.BYTEs) on this memory unit.
        Returns:
        the total free capacity (in number of Simulator.BYTEs) on this memory unit

      • allocate

        void allocate(long size)
        Allocates the given size on the memory unit.
        You should not have to call this method directly. Throws a NotificationCodes.MU_FREE_CAPACITY_CHANGED notification.
        Parameters:
        size - the size in number of Simulator.BYTEs
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given size cannot be allocated, use getFreeCapacity first

      • free

        void free(long size)
        Frees size on the memory unit.
        You should not have to call this method directly. Throws a NotificationCodes.MU_FREE_CAPACITY_CHANGED notification.
        Parameters:
        size - the size in number of Simulator.BYTEs
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given size cannot be freed

      • getMemoryZones

        List<Zone> getMemoryZones()
        Returns a list containing all memory zones inside this MemoryUnit.
        Returns:
        a list containing all memory zones inside this MemoryUnit

      • findReplica

        Zone findReplica(Zone zone)
        Returns the first MemoryZone candidate that satisfies candidate.isReplicaOf(zone), or null.

        If the given zone's parent is the current memory unit, then it is returned directly.

        Parameters:
        zone -
        Returns:
        the first MemoryZone candidate that satisfies candidate.isReplicaOf(zone), or null
